definition: to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for welding a lead of diode and a diode.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種二極管引線燒焊方法及二極管。

sentences.english: The most widely used industrial welding method is arc welding.
sentences.chinese: 電弧焊是工業上最常用的燒焊方法。

sentences.english: I think that the on-site training will be necessary for the tank.
sentences.chinese: 我想槽罐燒焊事情的現場培養訓練是須要的。

sentences.english: Spiral-welded steel pipe is available in sizes from 6to 36 inches.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋燒焊鋼管的尺寸從六寸到三十六寸。

sentences.english: Do not watch welding processes unless your eyes are properly protected.
sentences.chinese: 沒有正確的護目鏡，不要看燒焊作業。

sentences.english: Today, welding is the most commonly used method of fabrication of pressure vessels.
sentences.chinese: 在當今的壓力容器打造中，燒焊時最常用的一種方法。

sentences.english: When we! ding be sure to wear hood and barricade the working area.
sentences.chinese: 燒焊時必須戴上面罩並將工作區域圍起來。

sentences.english: The brazing height is adjusted by electric power. The setting also contained the fine tuning.
sentences.chinese: 燒焊高度用電動調整，有微調裝置。

sentences.english: Weld projection punches and die buttons will not be mounted in the stripper.
sentences.chinese: 燒焊的打凸衝子及模板入子不允許安裝在脫料板上。

sentences.english: When welding be sure to wear hood and barricade the working area.
sentences.chinese: 燒焊時必須戴上面罩並將工作區域圍起來。

sentences.english: Construction noise, dust and smell induced from welding process will be caused occasionally by the site works.
sentences.chinese: 工程將會間歇地產生噪音，塵埃及燒焊時產生之氣味。

definition: environmental impact assessment EIA/abbr. to 環評|环评
pinyin: huan2 jing4 ying3 xiang3 ping2 gu1
